thread.title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend expecting first child
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend expecting first child | Examiner.com

author: Margaret Minnicks
title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend expecting first child
text:
Play John Legend and Chrissy Teigen announced on Instagram that they are expecting a baby. Keri Lumm (@thekerilumm) has the story. on.aol.com Chrissy Teigen , 29, and husband John Legend , 36, have been trying to have a baby for a long time. The model made the announcement on Monday evening that they are expecting their first child, according to Us Weekly . The expectant mother posted on Instagram, “John and I are so happy to announce that we are pregnant :) As many of you know, we’ve been trying to have a baby for a while now. It hasn’t been easy, but we kept trying because we can’t wait to bring our first child into the world and grow our family." The announcement included a black and white photo with Legend resting his hand on his wife's stomach.
Photo by Larry Busacca/Getty Images Teigen has not kept it a secret that she was having problems conceiving. She recently revealed on her talk show “FABLife” that she and Legend were undergoing IVF. She also confessed how difficult it has been trying to dodge baby questions over the last few years.
E! Online reported and posted responses from fans of the celebrities about the news. What most people said was that the couple will no doubt have a beautiful baby whether it will be a boy or a girl. Chrissy Teigen first met musician John Legend on the set of his 2007 music video for "Stereo." After four years of dating, Teigen became engaged to him in December 2011. They married on Sept, 14, 2013 in Como, Italy. The song "All of Me" was written for her, and Legend sang it at their wedding.
Even before the couple was married, Chrissy and John were trying to have a baby. Now they are really excited, and the public is also excited for these two beautiful people. Since John wrote a song and sang it for his wife, it will be no surprise if he writes a song and sings it for the new little Legend.
